Bourne Osteopath Clinic » Mr Jo Sunner

Qualitive healthcare without the wait!

Diagnosis, management, treatment and prevention of musculoskeletal and other related disorders without the use of drugs or surgery.

In Bourne, all treatments are in a medical centre, providing the perfect safe, caring environment, giving necessary peace of mind to you, the patient.

About us

All consultations at The Bourne Osteopath Clinic focus on the diagnosis, management, treatment and prevention of musculoskeletal and other related disorders without the use of drugs or surgery.
In Bourne, all treatments are in a medical centre, providing the perfect safe, caring environment, giving necessary peace of mind to you, the patient. Treatments are available Monday to Saturday with free parking.
The clinic is open to everyone.

Mr Jo Sunner
BSc(ost.) DO. MMSM. Registered Osteopath
01778 426000
07943 336336

Mr. Jo Sunner is the principle at Bourne Osteopath Clinic. He is the longest clinically established osteopath in the area. He is also the only Registered Osteopath with clinical experience of consulting at the Fitzwilliam Hospital in Peterborough working with orthopedic consultants, pain management consultants and consultant rheumatologists.
Jo also now consults at the Avicenna Clinic, in peterborough which is a consultant led private clinic. Avicenna clinic has the only “open MRI ” scanner in the area.

Mr. Jo Sunner is the principle at Bourne Osteopath Clinic. He is the longest clinically established osteopath in the area. He is also the only Registered Osteopath with clinical experience of consulting at the Fitzwilliam Hospital in Peterborough working with orthopedic consultants, pain management consultants and consultant rheumatologists.
Jo also now consults at the Avicenna Clinic, in peterborough which is a consultant led private clinic. Avicenna clinic has the only “open MRI ” scanner in the area.

When it comes to treating your pain, trust a professional in Bourne!

Geoff Capes

I have been going to Jo, saw for my neck issues. I look forward to my visits. From day one Jo put me at ease as I was quite nervous, and I always walk out feeling so much better- Jo is very knowledgeable about all health issues, regularly giving me advice. such a lovely man

SaraL-33, patient

After spending hundreds on physiotherapy that only seemed to last several days, I was introduced to Jo Sunner and although sceptical I found results after the first session. I can’t recommend Bourne Osteopath Clinic enough!

I had a severe back problem for a number of years, which resulted in two major surgeries. Throughout this Jo has been excellent. Professional, kind, supportive and honest about what he can and cannot help with. He also treats my daughter who lives in London and this has been possible because Jo has been extremely flexible about appointment times. I would recommend Jo to anyone.

I had an emergency! I couldn’t turn my head, I had major pain in my neck and upper back and around my right shoulder. Came on instantly one morning at work and got progressively worse very quickly. Turns out I had a trapped nerve in my back. Mr Sunner sorted it within 2 visits. Was so pleased. I needed just one day off work and actually didn’t realise the extent of my issue as since my visit I have had so much more flexibility and movement than before my reason for visiting. Highly recommend!
